metadata.title: Sightline T607 Medium Fit Multifocus Progressive Power Reading Glasses Grey 3.00
features: Sightline T607 multifocus reading glasses are built with ultra-premium quality eyeglass frames, and Sightline's patented easy adapt lens technology.
You will look great in our most popular lens shape

Correct fit is important for multifocus reading glasses to ensure lenses are properly positioned in front of your eyes. This pair of Sightline Readers is a medium size and will fit most folks. Feel the comfort!

The craftsmanship and attention to detail that goes into this pair of reading glasses is second to none. If you appreciate quality, this pair of reading glasses is sure to please. Many Sightline styles available on Amazon
USA based customer service and support.
description: Reading glasses have finally evolved from single vision to multifocus, progressive lens technology! You spend a good portion of your time working with high-tech devices and displays. To stay focused for extended periods when using computers, smartphones, tablets and laptops you need better reading glasses. Traditional reading glasses magnify objects at a distance of about eighteen inches. SightLine multifocus Readers give you a deeper field of vision than regular reading glasses, Ergonomics are improved- you can work longer in comfort.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "7 x 3 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces", "Department": "unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "May 12, 2021", "Manufacturer": "SightLine"}
